name: Loopedin
description: Loopedin is an ecotechnology packaging provider which enables food & beverage retailers and corporates to switch from single-use plastic containers to fully-reusable and food-grade recyclable inventories.
value_proposition: Switch from single-use plastic containers to fully-reusable and food-grade recyclable inventories
services: Quality sustainable and reusable packaging inventory management
design_principle: Minimal impact on existing business processes
